## Weight Preparation

### Loading of Raw Data

```{r load-raw-data}
raw_preg_1985_1987 <- read_sas(
  data_file = here('data/NSFG/d1985_1987fempreg.sas7bdat'),
  catalog_file = here('data/NSFG/d1985_1987fempreg.sas7bcat')
)
raw_fem_1985_1987 <- read_sas(
  data_file = here('data/NSFG/d1985_1987femresp.sas7bdat'),
  catalog_file = here('data/NSFG/d1985_1987femresp.sas7bcat')
)
```


### Data Preparation

```{r data-preparation, dependson="load-raw-data"}
cm_to_date <- function(x) {
  x_int <- as.integer(x)
  if_else(
    is.na(x_int) | x_int > 9000 | x_int == 0,
    NA,
    ym(paste0(
      floor((x_int - 1) / 12) + 1900,
      factor(
        x_int %% 12,
        levels = 0:11,
        labels = c('Dec', 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov')
      )
    ))
  )
}


data_preg <- select(
    raw_preg_1985_1987,
    
    SEQNUM,
    W_5,
    starts_with('REPWGT'),
    
    # Variables used in post-stratification
    AGEPREG,
    B14MO, #DATEND,
    FMAROUT, #FMAROUT5,
    OUTCOME,
    
    # Variable used in pregnancy counts
    WANTWIFE, #WANTRESP,
    
    # Variable used in births test harness
    NUMBIRTH #NBRNLV
  ) |>
  rename(
    caseid = SEQNUM
  ) |>
  mutate(

    # Variables used in post-stratification
    AgeAtEndOfPregnancy = as.integer(AGEPREG / 100),
    Year = year(cm_to_date(B14MO)),
    FMAROUT = as_factor(labelled(FMAROUT, c(
      "NEVER FORMALLY MARRIED" = 1,
      "EVER FORMALLY MARRIED" = 2
    ))),
    OUTCOME = as_factor(labelled(OUTCOME, c(
      "LIVE BIRTH" = 1,
      "INDUCED ABORTION" = 2,
      "MISCARRIAGE" = 3,
      "STILLBIRTH" = 4,
      "CURRENTLY PREGNANCY" = 5
    ))),
    WANTWIFE = as_factor(labelled(WANTWIFE, c(
      "OVERDUE" = 1,
      "TIMED RIGHT" = 2,
      "MISTIMED" = 3,
      "INDIFFERENT" = 4,
      "UNWANTED" = 5,
      "UNDETERMINED" = 6
    ))),
    
    # Variable used for pregnancy counts
    one = 1,
    intent = as.factor(
      if_else(
        WANTWIFE %in% 1:2,
        'Intended',
        'Unintended'
      )
    ),
    
    # Variables used for births test harness
    NBRNLV = case_when(
      NUMBIRTH %in% 1:3 ~ NUMBIRTH,
      OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' ~ 1,
      .default = 0
    ),
    age_group6 = cut(
      as.integer(AGEPREG / 100),
      breaks = c(0, seq(20, 40, 5), Inf),
      right = FALSE,
      labels = c(
        "Under 20 years",
        "20-24 years",
        "25-29 years",
        "30-34 years",
        "35-39 years",
        "40 years and over"
      )
    ),
    
    # Variables used in abortions test harness
    births = if_else(
      OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH',
      NBRNLV,
      0
    ),
    abortion = if_else(
      OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION',
      1,
      0
    )
  )


data_fem <- select(
    raw_fem_1985_1987,
    caseid,
    W5,
    starts_with('REPWGT'),
    A_5,
    RACE,
    FMARITAL,
    PARITY
  ) |>
  mutate(
    one = 1,
    
    W5 = W5 / 100,
    across(starts_with('REPWGT'), \(x) x / 100),
    
    # Define the source variables to be used for the post-stratification variables
    age_granular = paste(
      cut(
        A_5,
        breaks = c(13, 17, 19, 24, 29, 34, 39, 45),
        labels = c('15-17', '18-19', '20-24', '25-29', '30-34', '35-39', '40-44')
      ),
      'years'
    ),
    race2 = if_else(
      RACE == 1,
      'Black',
      'Other than black'
    ),
    marital_history = if_else(
      FMARITAL == 6,
      'Never married',
      'Ever married'
    ),
    parity2 = if_else(
      PARITY == 0,
      '0',
      '1 or more'
    ),
    parity3 = case_when(
      PARITY == 0 ~ '0',
      PARITY == 1 ~ '1',
      .default = '2 or more'
    ),
    parity4 = case_when(
      PARITY == 0 ~ '0',
      PARITY == 1 ~ '1',
      PARITY == 2 ~ '2',
      .default = '3 or more'
    ),
    parity5 = case_when(
      PARITY == 0 ~ '0',
      PARITY == 1 ~ '1',
      PARITY == 2 ~ '2',
      PARITY == 3 ~ '3',
      .default = '4 or more'
    ),
    
    # Define the post-stratification variables
    age_race_marital_history = factor(paste(
      age_granular,
      race2,
      if_else(
        age_granular %in% c('15-17 years', '18-19 years'),
        'All marital histories',
        marital_history
      ),
      sep = ', '
    )),
    age_race_parity = factor(paste(
      age_granular,
      race2,
      case_when(
        age_granular == '15-17 years' ~ 'All parities',
        age_granular == '18-19 years' ~ parity2,
        age_granular == '20-24 years' ~ parity4,
        age_granular == '25-29 years' ~ parity5,
        age_granular == '30-34 years' ~ parity5,
        age_granular == '35-39 years' ~ parity5,
        age_granular == '40-44 years' ~ parity5
      ),
      sep = ', '
    ))
  ) |>
  left_join(
    data_preg |>
      group_by(caseid) |>
      summarize(
        abortions_1980_1985 = sum(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1980:1985),
        abortion_1980_1985_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1980:1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 19) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1980:1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 20 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1980:1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 25 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          #any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1980:1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '30-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1980:1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year %in% 1980:1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        abortion_1980plus_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 19) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 20 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 25 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          #any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '30-39 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'INDUCED ABORTION' & Year >= 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1985_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 19) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 20 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 25 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1985 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1984_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1984 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 19) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1984 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 20 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1984 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 25 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1984 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1984 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1983_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1983 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 19) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1983 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 20 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1983 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 25 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1983 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1983 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1982_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1982 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 19) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1982 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 20 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1982 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 25 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1982 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1982 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1981_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1981 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 19) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1981 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 20 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1981 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 25 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1981 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1981 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          .default = 'Other'
        ),
        birth_1980_age = case_when(
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 19) ~ 'Under 20 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 20 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 24) ~ '20-24 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 25 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 29) ~ '25-29 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 30 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 34) ~ '30-34 years',
          any(OUTCOME == 'LIVE BIRTH' & Year == 1980 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy >= 35 & AgeAtEndOfPregnancy <= 39) ~ '35-39 years',
          .default = 'Other'
        )
      ),
    by = 'caseid'
  ) |>
  mutate(
    abortions_1980_1985 = coalesce(abortions_1980_1985, 0),
    abortions_1980_1985_multiplier = if_else(
      abortions_1980_1985 >= 1,
      abortions_1980_1985,
      1
    ),
    across(
      starts_with('birth_'),
      function(x) {
        factor(
          coalesce(x, 'Other'),
          levels = c(
            'Under 20 years',
            '20-24 years',
            '25-29 years',
            '30-34 years',
            '35-39 years',
            'Other'
          ),
          order = TRUE
        )
      }
    ),
    across(
      starts_with('abortion_'),
      function(x) {
        factor(
          coalesce(x, 'Other'),
          levels = c(
            'Under 20 years',
            '20-24 years',
            '25-29 years',
            '30-34 years',
            '35-39 years',
            #'30-39 years',
            'Other'
          ),
          order = TRUE
        )
      }
    ),
    abortion_1980plus_age = if_else(
      abortion_1980plus_age != abortion_1980_1985_age & abortion_1980_1985_age != 'Other',
      abortion_1980_1985_age,
      abortion_1980plus_age
    )
  )


before_fem <- data_fem |>
  as_survey_rep(
    type = 'BRR',
    weights = W5,
    repweights = starts_with('REPWGT')
  )
```


### Recreation of Demographic Post-Stratification Targets

```{r create-demographic-post-stratification-targets, dependson="data-preparation"}
post_stratification_estimates <- bind_rows(
  before_fem |>
    group_by(age_race_parity) |>
    summarize(Freq = survey_total(one)) |>
    mutate(
      Variable = 'age_race_parity',
      Level = age_race_parity,
      .keep = 'unused',
      .before = everything()
    ),
  before_fem |>
    group_by(age_race_marital_history) |>
    summarize(Freq = survey_total(one)) |>
    mutate(
      Variable = 'age_race_marital_history',
      Level = age_race_marital_history,
      .keep = 'unused',
      .before = everything()
    )
) |> group_by(Variable)
  

post_stratification_estimates |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(decimal = 0)


demographic_targets <- post_stratification_estimates |>
  select(-Freq_se) |>
  group_by(Variable) |>
  group_split() |>
  lapply(function(tbl) {
    variable_name <- first(pull(tbl, Variable))
    tbl <- select(tbl, -Variable)
    names(tbl) <- c(variable_name, 'Freq')
    tbl
  })
```


### Creation of External Post-Stratification Targets

```{r create-post-stratification-targets}
population_total <- before_fem |>
  summarize(Freq = survey_total(one)) |>
  pull(Freq) |>
  sum()


guttmacher_APC_national <- read_csv(
    here('data/Guttmacher/NationalAndStatePregnancy_PublicUse.csv'),
    show_col_types = FALSE
  ) |>
  filter(state == 'US') |>
  mutate(interpolated = year %in%
      c(1983, 1986, 1989, 1990, 1993, 1994, 1997, 1998, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2006,
        2009, 2012, 2015)
  ) |>
  select('year', 'interpolated', 'abortionslt20', 'abortions2024',
    'abortions2529', 'abortions3034', 'abortions3539', 'abortions40plus',
    'abortionstotal')


guttmacher_APC_age <- guttmacher_APC_national |>
  select(-abortions40plus, -abortionstotal) |>
  filter(year %in% 1980:1985) |>
  #mutate(
  #  abortions3039 = abortions3034 + abortions3539,
  #  .keep = 'unused'
  #) |>
  rename(
    `Under 20 years` = abortionslt20,
    `20-24 years` = abortions2024,
    `25-29 years` = abortions2529,
    `30-34 years` = abortions3034,
    `35-39 years` = abortions3539
    #`30-39 years` = abortions3039
  ) |>
  summarize(across(3:7, sum)) |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = everything(),
    names_to = 'abortion_1980_1985_age',
    values_to = 'Freq'
  ) |>
  select(abortion_1980_1985_age, Freq) %>%
  bind_rows(summarize(
    .,
    abortion_1980_1985_age = 'Other',
    Freq = population_total - sum(Freq)
  )) |>
  mutate(
    abortion_1980_1985_age = factor(
      abortion_1980_1985_age,
      levels = c(
        'Under 20 years',
        '20-24 years',
        '25-29 years',
        #'30-39 years',
        '30-34 years',
        '35-39 years',
        'Other'
      ),
      ordered = TRUE
    )
  )


NVSS_age <- readRDS(here('data/NVSS/natality_by_age_1974-1994us.Rds')) |>
  filter(
    Year %in% 1980:1985 &
      mage8 %in% c(
        'Under 15 years',
        '15-19 years',
        '20-24 years',
        '25-29 years',
        '30-34 years',
        '35-39 years'
      )
  ) |>
  mutate(
    Variable = paste0('birth_', Year, '_age'),
    Level = forcats::fct_recode(
      mage8,
      `Under 20 years` = 'Under 15 years',
      `Under 20 years` = '15-19 years'
    ),
    .keep = 'unused',
    .before = 'n'
  ) |>
  group_by(Variable, Level) |>
  summarize(n = sum(n), .groups = 'drop') |>
  arrange(Variable, Level) |>
  group_by(Variable) |>
  group_split() |>
  lapply(function(tbl) {
    variable_name <- first(pull(tbl, Variable))
    tbl <- select(tbl, -Variable)
    names(tbl) <- c(variable_name, 'Freq')
    tbl %>%
      add_row(
        summarize(
          .,
          across(where(is.factor), ~'Other'),
          Freq = population_total - sum(Freq)
        )
      ) |>
      mutate(
        across(where(is.character), function(x) {
          factor(
            x,
            levels = c(
              'Under 20 years',
              '20-24 years',
              '25-29 years',
              '30-34 years',
              '35-39 years',
              'Other'
            ),
            ordered = TRUE
          )
        })
      )
  })
```


### Post-Stratifications

```{r rake-post-stratifications, dependson=c("data-preparation", "create-post-stratification-targets")}
source(here('R/rake2.R'))
  
post_stratification_targets <- c(
  list(guttmacher_APC_age),
  NVSS_age,
  demographic_targets
)

extras <- replicate(length(post_stratification_targets), NULL)
extras[[1]] <- c(
  ~abortions_1980_1985_multiplier,
  ~abortion_1980plus_age
)

post_fem <- rake2(
  before_fem,
  sample.margins = lapply(
    post_stratification_targets,
    \(x) as.formula(paste0('~', colnames(x)[1]))
  ),
  population.margins = post_stratification_targets,
  extras = extras,
  control=list(maxit=50, epsilon=1, verbose=FALSE)
)
```

### Observations with Extreme Weights

#### By Entropy

```{r extreme-entropy, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
entropy_extreme_before <- before_fem$variables |>
  select(caseid, W5) |>
  filter(
    W5^2 > 10 * mean(W5^2)
  )

entropy_extreme_after <-  after_fem$variables |>
  select(caseid, FULL_SAMPLE_WGT) |>
  filter(
    FULL_SAMPLE_WGT^2 > 10 * mean(FULL_SAMPLE_WGT^2)
  )

data.frame(
  Label = c(
    'Total Observations',
    'Extreme Weights Before',
    'Extreme Weights After',
    'Difference'
  ),
  Count = c(
    nrow(after_fem),
    nrow(entropy_extreme_before),
    nrow(entropy_extreme_after),
    nrow(entropy_extreme_after) - nrow(entropy_extreme_before)
  )
) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(decimal = 0)
```


#### By Inter-Quartile Range (IQR)

```{r extreme-iqr, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
iqr_extreme_after <- after_fem$variables |>
  select(caseid, FULL_SAMPLE_WGT) |>
  filter(
    FULL_SAMPLE_WGT > 5 * IQR(FULL_SAMPLE_WGT) + median(FULL_SAMPLE_WGT)
  )

iqr_extreme_before <- before_fem$variables |>
  select(caseid, W5) |>
  filter(
    W5 > 5 * IQR(W5) + median(W5)
  )

data.frame(
```

```{r verify-post-stratification, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
check_poststratifications <- function(targets) {
  variable_name <- colnames(targets)[1]

  estimates <- after_fem |>
    group_by(get(variable_name)) |>
    summarize(
      n = n(),
      Est = survey_total(one)
    )
  
  colnames(estimates)[1] <- variable_name
  
  full_join(
    estimates,
    targets,
    by = variable_name
  ) |>
    mutate(
      Diff = Est - Freq
    ) |>
    gt() |>
    fmt_number(c(Est, Freq), decimal = 0) |>
    fmt_number(c(Est_se, Diff), decimal = 2)
}
```

### Abortions

This survey will cover years 1980 to 1985.

```{r abortions, dependson=c("create-post-stratification-targets", "create-survey-objects")}
guttmacher_APC_national |>
  filter(year %in% 1980:1985) |>
  summarize(Abortions = sum(abortionstotal)) |>
  cbind(
    before_preg |>
      group_by(Year) |>
      summarize(
        n = unweighted(sum(abortion)),
        Est = survey_total(abortion, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1980:1985) |>
      select(-Year) |>
      summarize(across(everything(), sum)) |>
      rename(
        Est_Before = Est,
        Est_Before_low = Est_low,
        Est_Before_upp = Est_upp
      )
  ) |>
  cbind(
    after_preg |>
      group_by(Year) |>
      summarize(
        Est = survey_total(abortion, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1980:1985) |>
      select(-Year) |>
      summarize(across(everything(), sum)) |>
      rename(
        Est_After = Est,
        Est_After_low = Est_low,
        Est_After_upp = Est_upp
      )
  ) |>
  mutate(
    Bias_Before = Est_Before - Abortions,
    Rel_Bias_Before = Bias_Before / Abortions,
    `Covers_Before?` = Abortions <= Est_Before_upp & Abortions >= Est_Before_low,
    Bias_After = Est_After - Abortions,
    Rel_Bias_After = Bias_After / Abortions,
    `Covers_After?` = Abortions <= Est_After_upp & Abortions >= Est_After_low,
    Bias_Diff = abs(Bias_After) - abs(Bias_Before),
    Est_Diff = Est_After - Est_Before,
    Rel_Bias_Diff = abs(Rel_Bias_After) - abs(Rel_Bias_Before),
    `Fixed?` = if_else(
        !`Covers_Before?`,
        `Covers_After?`,
        NA
    ),
    `Broke?` = `Covers_Before?` & !`Covers_After?`
  ) |>
  select(
    n,
    Abortions,
    Est_Before,
    #Est_Before_low,
    #Est_Before_upp,
    Est_After,
    Est_After_low,
    Est_After_upp,
    #Est_Diff,
    #Bias_Before,
    #Bias_After,
    #Bias_Diff,
    Rel_Bias_Before,
    Rel_Bias_After,
    #Rel_Bias_Diff,
    #`Unc_Covers?`,
    #`Cal_Covers?`,
    `Fixed?`,
    `Broke?`
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_percent(contains('Rel_Bias'), decimal = 1)
```

### Pregnancies by Year

This survey will cover years 1980 to 1985.

```{r pregnancies-per-year, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
bind_rows(list(
  before_preg |>
    group_by(Year) |>
    summarize(
      n = n(),
      Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'se')
    ) |>
    mutate(
      RSE = Freq_se / Freq,
      post_strat = 'before'
    ) |>
    filter(Year %in% 1980:1985),
  after_preg |>
    group_by(Year) |>
    summarize(
      n = n(),
      Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'se')
    ) |>
    mutate(
      RSE = Freq_se / Freq,
      post_strat = 'after'
    ) |>
    filter(Year %in% 1980:1985)
)) |> inner_join(
  bind_rows(list(
    before_preg |>
      group_by(Year) |>
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      mutate(
        Freq_CI_range = Freq_upp - Freq_low,
        Rel_CI = Freq_CI_range / Freq,
        post_strat = 'before'
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1980:1985),
    after_preg |>
      group_by(Year) |>
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      mutate(
        Freq_CI_range = Freq_upp - Freq_low,
        Rel_CI = Freq_CI_range / Freq,
        post_strat = 'after'
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1980:1985)
  )),
  by = join_by(Year, post_strat, Freq, n)
) |>
  select(Year, post_strat, everything()) |>
  mutate(
    post_strat = factor(
      post_strat,
      levels = c('before', 'after'),
      ordered = TRUE
    )
  ) |>
  arrange(Year, post_strat) |>
  group_by(Year) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(
    starts_with('Freq'),
    decimals = 0
  ) |>
  fmt_percent(
    c(RSE, Rel_CI)
  )
```

```{r pregnancies-per-year-by-intent, dependson="create-survey-objects"}
      RSE = Freq_se / Freq,
      post_strat = 'before'
    ) |>
    filter(Year %in% 1980:1985),
  after_preg |>
    group_by(Year, intent) |>
    summarize(
      n = n(),
      Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'se')
    ) |>
    mutate(
      RSE = Freq_se / Freq,
      post_strat = 'after'
    ) |>
    filter(Year %in% 1980:1985)
)) |> inner_join(
  bind_rows(list(
    before_preg |>
      group_by(Year, intent) |>
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      mutate(
        Freq_CI_range = Freq_upp - Freq_low,
        Rel_CI = Freq_CI_range / Freq,
        post_strat = 'before'
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1980:1985),
    after_preg |>
      group_by(Year, intent) |>
      summarize(
        n = n(),
        Freq = survey_total(one, vartype = 'ci')
      ) |>
      mutate(
        Freq_CI_range = Freq_upp - Freq_low,
        Rel_CI = Freq_CI_range / Freq,
        post_strat = 'after'
      ) |>
      filter(Year %in% 1980:1985)
  )),
  by = join_by(Year, intent, post_strat, Freq, n)
) |>
  select(Year, intent, post_strat, everything()) |>
  mutate(
    post_strat = factor(
      post_strat,
      levels = c('before', 'after'),
      ordered = TRUE
    )
  ) |>
  arrange(Year, intent, post_strat) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(
    starts_with('Freq'),
    decimals = 0
  ) |>
  fmt_percent(
    c(RSE, Rel_CI)
  )
```
